about.title: About Me
about.p1: I'm a web developer with 2 years of professional experience. I have a degree in information and communication technology from the university of Universidad Interámericana para el Desarrollo (UNID) in Mexico

p2.pre: Since I’ve been studying, I can say I’ve done:

list.i1: <0>More than 30 small personal projects</0>: projects to enforce my knowledge while I was forming myself.
list.i2: <0>1 personal project</0>: comport is a project that I hope some day soon will be consumed.
list.i3: <0>At least 3 big professional projects</0>: while I was working at Quickapps I help finishing 2 big projects and one more left it on standby.

about.p3: I’m autodidact and I’m constantly improving my knowledge and learning the latest in technology. Currently I’m improving my skills in React, Jest, Docker with WSL and I’m looking forward in the future to complete a master’s degree.

p4.pre: I’m a person who thinks that in order to dedicate your life to something, you should’ve had experienced other fields, that’s the reason I cannot define myself as a Back-End, Front-End, DevOps developer and the reason I have knowledge in different type of technologies. but I believe now that I will try to become an expert in Front Development, with that all being said I can say my skills are defined as follows:

list.i1: <0>Fluent</0>: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Typescript, Vue, Node.js
list.i2: <0>Proficient</0>: React, Angular, Linux, Docker, MongoDB, MySQL, TDD/Jest, Git, Socket.io
list.i3: <0>Prior Experience</0>: Zoho, Genexus, D3.js, React Native

p5.pre: My Level of English is currently not certified but I considered as myself as B2, I finished a TOEIC exam on 07/2021 sadly I still don’t have the results yet, gladly,

projects.title: Projects
projects.rock-paper: A simple game that allows you to play Rock Paper Scissors. You can play with the computer or with another player. You can also play the variant of Rock Paper Scissors Lizard Spock.
projects.comport:
Camport is a personal project in which i will try to boost the alternatives of mexican farmer producers, so they do not depend of local buyers. 

I just finished the project because of this, still there are not real users.
projects.math-fights: An app that allows you to play a math game againt the computer or another player. this app is still in development so i'm adding more features and fixing bugs.
